content.en: Multi-target tracking: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of multi-target tracking. These algorithms aim to improve data association, track fusion, and target tracking in cluttered environments. Examples include the use of fuzzy logic, possibility theory, fuzzy clustering, maximum entropy, and adaptive fuzzy density clustering. These algorithms offer efficient and novel approaches to enhance the performance of multi-target tracking systems.
content.da: Multi-target tracking: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for området multi-target tracking. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre dataassociation, track-fusion og målsporing i rodet miljøer. Eksempler inkluderer brug af fuzzy logik, mulighedsteori, fuzzy clustering, maksimal entropi og adaptiv fuzzy tæthets clustering. Disse algoritmer tilbyder effektive og nye tilgange til at forbedre ydeevnen af multi-target tracking systemer.
